descriptionHTML:
That instant you look at your watch can be out of this world! All the matter, galaxies and nebulae spinning through space create the most amazing sights in the cosmos. We’ve fallen in love with the delicate beauty of the skies.

Make the beauty of the universe part of your watch.

Features:
* 10 faces - a timeless collection of beauty
* both space and stars visualised
* subtly-lit hands when in ambient mode
* battery indicator and date shown on face
* face sustains battery life

For round and square watch faces.
comments: Okay Could do with more options, digital display, watch and phone batteries etc
recentChanges: Added options button - now by selecting watch face on a watch there is only one default cosmos displayed - and a button.
To change cosmos You have to simple press a button and select the choosen one.
